sentences: Eric Revis (born May 31, 1967) is a jazz bassist and composer.
Since 1997 he has been a member of Branford Marsalis's ensemble.
His debut album, Tales of the Stuttering Mime, was released in 2004 on his own 11:11 Records.
Revis studied under Ellis Marsalis at the University of New Orleans and at St. Mary's University, Texas.
He directed the Jazz Ensemble at Trinity University in San Antonio, Texas in 2007 and 2008.
